Effect: Spawn aBloatick Tunnelat the target location after a delay of 60 frames (4 in-game seconds)
Spawns a Bloatick every 6 seconds, up to a maximum of 8 Bloaticks
Notes: Loses 1 hit point every frame (0.07 in-game seconds)
Does not keep the player in game ifShort Gameis enabled in skirmish and multiplayer
